name: Terrorist Strike Group 2018
description:
Play like a real frontline warrior to assassin the enemies in 3d fps shooting. As the best commando, you have to combat with your powerful shooting equipment to defeat the enemies.

Features:
- Realistic Shooting game Environment.
- The latest model of Sniper shooter Guns.
- HD graphics of the game.
- Real physics of shooting guns.
- Realistic gameplay.
- Shooting Experience.
- More Fun.
